threads: Enough with the mainstream media fear-mongering, it's time to question the rushed Covid-19 vaccines and consider alternative solutions that respect individual liberties and medical freedoms.
text: @alt_right, u r ignoring the facts. covid's not a hoax. science is real. vaccines save lives. individual liberties r important but not at the cost of public health. we need gov intervention to ensure equitable access.
